name: Golden Entreaty
desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruins of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's back. Golden inscriptions are etched into the surface of the white disc, and when touched, one can sense the intricate patterns pulsating as if imbued with life.

value.name: Revelations from the Past
value.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.
